api_list.name: Get All Sports Predictions
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get predictions. This endpoint provides different filters passed as POST Form parameters. This API requires you to supply sport_id use Get Sports endpoint to get a list of available sport IDs

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Filter by Date, date format should be YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: competition
optional_parameters.description: Specify competition or leave blank to get prediction for all competitions

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Specify country or leave blank to get prediction for all countries. You can also provide multiple countries by separating them with comma ( , ) e.g ENG,ITA

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: Specify market or leave blank to get prediction for all markets

api_list.name: Get Soccer 3 Way Predictions
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get predictions. This endpoint provides different filters passed as POST Form parameters. This API retrieves ONLY predictions for 3 Way Soccer Sport

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Specify country or leave blank to get prediction for all countries. You can also provide multiple countries by separating them with comma ( , ) e.g ENG,ITA

optional_parameters.name: competition
optional_parameters.description: Specify competition or leave blank to get prediction for all competition

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/v3/soccer/prediction"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Soccer Prediction
api_list.description: Get prediction for soccer sports. This endpoint allows you get prediction for soccer ONLY

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Specify date in the format YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: Filter prediction by market, to get a list of available markets use GetMarket endpoint

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Filter prediction by Country, to get a list of available countries use GetCountry endpoint. 
You can also provide multiple countries by separating them with comma ( , ) e.g ENG,ITA

api_list.name: GetFixtures
api_list.description: This endpoints get all the  fixture information. The endpoint provides the following filters

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Filter fixture by date, allowed date format YYYY-MM-DD

api_list.name: GetMarkets
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all the available markets, use the returned market name  to filter predictions by market
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/v1/markets"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetCountries
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve all active countries. You can use the returned country names to filter predictions by country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/v1/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetStatistics
api_list.description: This endpoints get all the  statistics information.

api_list.name: GetSports
api_list.description: This endpoint returned a list of all active sports, the return payload contains sport_id which should be used to filter prediction by sport. Every sport has a unique identifier labelled sport_id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sports"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
